import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz'
import FormGrid from '../FormGrid'
import FormGroup from '../FormGroup'
import Input from '../Input'
import Select from '.'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"select"}}>{`Select`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Just a wrapper around `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://react-select.com/home"}}>{`react-select v2`}</MDXTag>{` for
restyling.`}</MDXTag>
